org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot

Class DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot.DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INode.Feature
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectorySnapshottableFeature

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature
extends Object
implements INode.Feature
    Feature used to store and process the snapshot diff information for a directory. In particular, it contains a directory diff list recording changes made to the directory and its children for each snapshot.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.ChildrenDiff
      The difference between the current state and a previous snapshot of the children list of an INodeDirectory.
      static class  DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.DirectoryDiff
      The difference of an INodeDirectory between two snapshots.
      static class  DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.DirectoryDiffList
      A list of directory diffs.

      • diffs

        private final DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.DirectoryDiffList diffs
        Diff list sorted by snapshot IDs, i.e. in chronological order.

      • cleanDeletedINode

        private static QuotaCounts cleanDeletedINode(BlockStoragePolicySuite bsps,
                            INode inode,
                            int post,
                            int prior,
                            INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo collectedBlocks,
                            List<INode> removedINodes)
        Clean an inode while we move it from the deleted list of post to the deleted list of prior.
        Parameters:
        bsps - The block storage policy suite.
        inode - The inode to clean.
        post - The post snapshot.
        prior - The id of the prior snapshot.
        collectedBlocks - Used to collect blocks for later deletion.
        Returns:
        Quota usage update.

      • getLastSnapshotId

        public int getLastSnapshotId()
        Returns:
        the last snapshot.

      • getDiffs

        public DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.DirectoryDiffList getDiffs()
        Returns:
        the snapshot diff list.

      • getSnapshotDirectory

        public void getSnapshotDirectory(List<INodeDirectory> snapshotDir)
        Get all the directories that are stored in some snapshot but not in the current children list. These directories are equivalent to the directories stored in the deletes lists.

      • addChild

        public boolean addChild(INodeDirectory parent,
               INode inode,
               boolean setModTime,
               int latestSnapshotId)
                 throws QuotaExceededException
        Add an inode into parent's children list. The caller of this method needs to make sure that parent is in the given snapshot "latest".
        Throws:
        QuotaExceededException

      • removeChild

        public boolean removeChild(INodeDirectory parent,
                  INode child,
                  int latestSnapshotId)
        Remove an inode from parent's children list. The caller of this method needs to make sure that parent is in the given snapshot "latest".

      • getChildrenList

        public ReadOnlyList<INode> getChildrenList(INodeDirectory currentINode,
                                  int snapshotId)
        Returns:
        If there is no corresponding directory diff for the given snapshot, this means that the current children list should be returned for the snapshot. Otherwise we calculate the children list for the snapshot and return it.

        public INode getChild(INodeDirectory currentINode,

      • computeDiffBetweenSnapshots

        boolean computeDiffBetweenSnapshots(Snapshot fromSnapshot,
                                  Snapshot toSnapshot,
                                  DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.ChildrenDiff diff,
                                  INodeDirectory currentINode)
        Compute the difference between Snapshots.
        Parameters:
        fromSnapshot - Start point of the diff computation. Null indicates current tree.
        toSnapshot - End point of the diff computation. Null indicates current tree.
        diff - Used to capture the changes happening to the children. Note that the diff still represents (later_snapshot - earlier_snapshot) although toSnapshot can be before fromSnapshot.
        currentINode - The INodeDirectory this feature belongs to.
        Returns:
        Whether changes happened between the startSnapshot and endSnaphsot.

      • cleanDirectory

        public QuotaCounts cleanDirectory(BlockStoragePolicySuite bsps,
                         INodeDirectory currentINode,
                         int snapshot,
                         int prior,
                         INode.BlocksMapUpdateInfo collectedBlocks,
                         List<INode> removedINodes)
